kert:test.kert:author: Claudius Teodorescu
kert:test.kert:title: Rendering of Docbook vocabulary
kert:test.kert:description: This test is for rendering a file in DocBook format, styled with a specialized CSS stylesheet. If the test is rendered in a styled manner and can be edited by using the specific annotators, the test is passed.

kert:test.kert:author: Claudius Teodorescu
kert:test.kert:title: Rendering of XLIFF vocabulary
kert:test.kert:description: This test is for rendering a file in XLIFF format, styled with a specialized CSS stylesheet. If the test is rendered in a styled manner and can be edited by using the specific annotators, the test is passed.

kert:test.kert:author: Claudius Teodorescu
kert:test.kert:title: Rendering of TEI vocabulary
kert:test.kert:description: This test is for rendering a file in TEI format, styled with a specialized CSS stylesheet. If the test is rendered in a styled manner and can be edited by using the specific annotators, the test is passed.

kert:test.kert:author: Claudius Teodorescu
kert:test.kert:title: Rendering of DITA vocabulary
kert:test.kert:description: This test is for rendering a file in DITA format, styled with a specialized CSS stylesheet. If the test is rendered in a styled manner and can be edited by using the specific annotators, the test is passed.

kert:test.kert:author: Claudius Teodorescu
kert:test.kert:title: Rendering of XProc vocabulary
kert:test.kert:description: This test is for rendering a file in XProc format, styled with a specialized CSS stylesheet. If the test is rendered in a styled manner and can be edited by using the specific annotators, the test is passed.

kert:test.kert:author: Claudius Teodorescu
kert:test.kert:title: Tokyo War Crimes
kert:test.kert:description: This test is for rendering Tokyo War Crimes file.

kert:test.kert:author: Claudius Teodorescu
kert:test.kert:title: Rendering of TEI vocabulary with change tracking
kert:test.kert:description: This test is for rendering a file in TEI format, styled with a specialized CSS stylesheet and with change tracking. If the test is rendered in a styled manner and can be edited by using the specific annotators, the test is passed.

kert:test.kert:author: Claudius Teodorescu
kert:test.kert:title: Rendering of TEI vocabulary, dictionary section
kert:test.kert:description: This test is for rendering a file in TEI format, dictionary section, styled with a specialized CSS stylesheet and with change tracking. If the test is rendered in a styled manner and can be edited by using the specific annotators, the test is passed.

kert:test.kert:author: Claudius Teodorescu
kert:test.kert:title: Missing content url
kert:test.kert:description: This test is for the non-fatal (recoverable) error that occurs when the 'content' parameter of the teian main page's query string is missing. If the default content is specifying that the content is missing, the test is passed.

kert:test.kert:author: Claudius Teodorescu
kert:test.kert:title: Wrong content url
kert:test.kert:description: This test is for the non-fatal (recoverable) error that occurs when the 'content' parameter of the teian main page's query string is wrong. If the default content is specifying that the content is missing, the test is passed.

kert:test.kert:author: Claudius Teodorescu
kert:test.kert:title: External links list in TEI
kert:test.kert:description: This test is for displaying a list of external links in TEI. If the list is displayed, the test is passed.
